clients.title: Google Updated the Options to Flag a Review
description: Google recently updated their options for flagging a review inside the Google My Business dashboard. There are now descriptions under each of the flag options, making it easier for a business owner to see which option they should choose. The old option labeled "hateful, violent, or innapropriate" has been split into 3 specific labels: profanity, bullying or harassment, and discrimination and hate speech. There is also a new option to flag that there is "personal information" in the review.
